::Dollen::

He turns to StarScream. 
"Lets go. It'll be faster if I ride with you."

OOC: I dont remember if Scyther and the rest of Killfests group arrived
at the entrance ready to go yet. If they did then they can follow. If
not they can catch up.

::Hot Rod::

He was bored and got thinking about Angel Prime. He opened a comm.
"Hey Angel, you need a hand out there?"

::DrillBit::

"Well Killfest, I guess we'll have to get things back to a normal rutine
around here. Have Dark Mouse start assigning bots stations and shifts."
A big smile appeared on his face.
"As for us, lets go to the bridge; and try out that command chair.
Hehe."

OOC: Hey Zardus, I lost track of Demolition and those bots you sent him
out with. Was there any more posts to that after they left the IF? If
yes, just tell me so I can get back on track. -_~
